item.doodads.beaver_teeth.tooltip.shift: Instantly break wood and strip logs without an axe, just like a beaver eh
item.doodads.ender_goggles.tooltip.shift: Look at enderman without making them angry
item.doodads.magic_plum.tooltip.shift: Acts like a totem after consumption upon death
item.doodads.paintbrush.tooltip.shift: Hold a dye in your main hand and use the brush on a block dyeable block to change its color
item.doodads.paintbrush.tooltip2.shift: Using a water bucket instead of a dye will wash the block instead
item.doodads.duct_tape.tooltip.shift: Use on a mob to silence it [Can be removed with shears]
item.doodads.soggy_glove.tooltip.shift: Instantly place concrete powder into concrete
item.doodads.loggers_glove.tooltip.shift: Prevents log stripping while using an axe
item.doodads.sun_ring.tooltip.shift: Provides a damage boost during the day
item.doodads.moon_ring.tooltip.shift: Provides a damage boost during the night
item.doodads.celestial_ring.tooltip.shif: Provides a higher damage boost during all times of day
death.attack.pebble: %1$s was hit with a pebble by %2$s
death.attack.pebble.item: %1$s was hit with a pebble by %2$s using %3$s
